name: Diablo Shrimp Saute
author: Pammiepi
summary: This spicy shrimp and pasta recipe is very quick and easy to make. Great recipe for hot summer days! Double the jalapeno pepper if you like it hot.
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a rolling boil
Cook the linguine at a boil, stirring occasionally, until the pasta is cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes; drain
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat
Cook and stir onion and jalapeno pepper in melted butter until tender, about 3 minutes
Add shrimp, tomatoes, and garlic; cook and stir until shrimp are opaque, about 2 minutes more
Pour white wine and lemon juice over shrimp mixture; continue cooking until the sauce thickens, 3 to 5 minutes
